Assessment Literacy content development via R

Installation

Stable version from CRAN 

install.packages("Literasee")

Development version from Github 

devtools::install_github("CenterForAssessment/Literasee")

Usage

  • The Literasee Package Wiki contains instructions on how to prepare data and run Literasee analyses.
  • The Literasee Package Documentation contains man pages for all functions and data sets in the the Literasee Package.
  • Numerous Literasee Gists provide other examples of analyses that can be performed.

Resources

  • Web: literasee.io
  • CRAN Repo: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Literasee

References

Betebenner, D. W. and VanIwaarden, A. (2017). Literasee: Assessment Literacy content development via R.

R Development Core Team (2017). R: A language and environment for statistical computing. R Foundation for Statistical Computing, Vienna, Austria. 3-900051-07-0.
